Create My Account Login Change Country India Buy Flight Options Upgrade Flight Pass Ply less, Fly More Empty Seat Preferred Seat Xtra Baggage Lounge Access Get luxury of Business Longue Flexibility Reward Earn rewards for your travel flexibility! Preferred Flight Fly on your preferred flight Multiple Booking Priority Handling Freedom to choose flight later Feel like VIP at Airport! My FlightPass Book Flight Buy Flight Pass Redeem / Book Fly more, pay less (up to 50% off) Save up to 50% on flight costs. No need to worry about fare increase as your low fare is locked-in Pool and Share Share your flight pass with friends, family or colleagues Personalized for you Customize your favorite destinations, Number of Flights, number of users, Travel Period, etc. to suit your needs Peace of mind Make your booking #& travel experience more convenient and relaxed. Save time and effort in searching flight deals. Book last available seat Enjoy the luxury to book any flight till the last available seat subject to your Advance Booking limit. No hidden restrictions or fees. More vacations, more family trips, more savings Cheapest, yet most convenient way to travel more and more for fun or pleasure. Pay only 20% and rest later Just pay 20% upfront and rest later in easy installments Most cost efficient way for business travel Book flights at last minute, manage travel online, share flight pass across all employees and earn maximum savings. Learn about Flight Pass Flight Pass Benefits Flight Pass Option - Fly more, pay less (up to 75% off)! Flight Pass allows you to conveniently pre-purchase a Number of Flights at an agreed LOW PRICE and enjoy the privilege of booking flights later as per your need. The more credits you buy, the cheaper it gets. • Cheapest Flights (up to 75% off). No more fare increase as your Flight Pass LOW fare is locked-in. Book even peak period flights at low price! • No blackout dates. No hidden fees or restrictions. No surcharges or additional fees. Fly on any date. No restrictions on trip duration. • Book flight till the last available seat subject to your Advance Booking limit (minimum days before travel you must book) and Travel Period. • Customize Flight Pass to suit your needs; Number of Flights, destinations to fly to, Travel Period, users who can book and fly etc. • Pay only 20% upfront and rest later with easy installments. • Pool and share your Flight Pass with friends, family or colleagues • A great travel solution for both leisure and business travel. With Flight Pass, you can Fly more, Pay up to 50% less, save time and effort in trip planning and booking and enhance your travel convenience! Read more... • Visit www.optiontown.com and select the Flight Pass Option tab. • In the search section, choose your desired Flight Pass features (Airline, Cabin, Travel Period, destinations you want to fly to and Number of Users) and click search. • Choose your desired Flight Pass. Click on \'Customise\' if you want to customise your Flight Pass. • Review and make the payment. You may also choose a Flexible Payment Plan with easy instalments Now, you are ready to make your bookings as per your Flight Pass. • Visit www.optiontown.com and select the Flight Pass Option tab. In the Book Flights section, enter your username and password to login to your account. • Choose the flight pass you want to use to book flights. • Input flight search criteria and click search. • Select your desired flight from the search results. • Add Users and review your flight selection. • Pay your intalment if your flight Pass was purchased with an instalment plan. • Submit your booking. • Receive your booking confirmation email as per the specification in your Flight Pass. • About Flight Pass Option • Pass Purchase • Pass Redeem / Book Flight • Payment How Can I Purchase Flight Pass? How can I book flights with my Flight Pass? Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
Testimonials

Send my User Name/Password to my email address Just send my User Name Back Customize Buy Write a Testimonial Logout Look what our customers have to say about us Express Check Out One Flight Pass for multiple destinations. More vacations.More fun. More savings Select a Country Search Advance Search Upgrade Travel Option (UTo) Upgrade to Business or First for up to 75% less! Upgrade Pass (UP) Buy multiple upgrades for even less Preferred Seat Option (PSo) Get seat of your choice. Preferred Seat Pass (PSP) Buy multiple preferred seats for even less Empty Seat Option (ESo) Enjoy FlatBed in Economy ! Empty Seat Pass (ESP) Buy multiple Economy Flatbeds for even less Flight Pass - The cheapest and most convenient way to fly! CHEAPEST FLIGHTS Flight Pass offers the cheapest flights (up to 50% off). No more worries about fare increase as your Flight Pass \'low fare\' is Locked-in. No hidden fees, no restrictions, no black-out periods No restrictions or black-out periods for your flight booking. Period. No surcharge or fees for peak days like christmas or holidays. Even if the market fare increases, you only pay the pre-agreed Low Fare with your Flight Pass. No minimum stay, maximum stay or saturday night stay limit. No restrictions on trip duration Full freedom and peace of mind in trip planning and booking Get complete freedom to plan and book trips at your convenience with Flight Pass. Save time and effort in doing flight search. No need to predict whether the fare will go up or down or when is the right time to purchase. With Flight Pass, all these hassles and stress will disappear from your dictionary. Instead, you\'ll love the freedom and conveinence of booking flights at your own will. Book your flight till last available seat Yes, it sounds too good to be true, but with Flight Pass, you can book any flight till the last available seat. No blackout dates. No restrictions on fare/booking classes. So, if a flight is available on the airline website, you can also book it with your Flight Pass on Optiontown.com. The only limitating factors are your pre-selected features, like Travel Period, Advance Booking limit (days before travel you must book) and Travel Flexibility. Pay Only 20% upfront and rest later in easy installments You can also choose the number of installments and the installment amount at a nominal cost. More vacations, more trips, more savings for Flight Pass offers the lowest fare per trip, which means you can take more trips for your budget. Rejuvenate your family bonds with more vacations and more frequent family get-togethers. Flight Pass makes it very easy to plan and book flights. Share your Flight Pass with friends and family Business Travel : Minimize travel costs and maximize productivity Combine all of your company travel volume and earn the highest savings. Save time and boost productivity by with last minute booking feature for your dynamic travel needs. Share a Flight Pass across all employees, serving as an easy and free travel management tool. Special offers for corporate flight passes. Easy to change your Flight Pass after purchase It\'s quite easy and convenient to change Flight Pass online for nominal fees. Flight changes are possible as per airline change or cancellation policies. Your own personalized Flight Pass Flight Pass offers an amazing level of personalization. Customize your Flight Pass by selecting your desired values for the following pass features. Optiontown is a pioneer in the world of travel options. Our vision is to develop unique and innovative travel options that help to optimize value for both travelers and travel providers. Built using our patented technologies, our revolutionary product portfolio includes the Upgrade Travel Option (UTo, pronounced as You Too), the Empty Seat Option (ESo), the Flight Pass Option(FPo), the Flexibility Reward Option (FRo), the Multiple Booking Option (MBo),the Preferred Flight Option (PFo), the Preferred Seat Option (PSo), the Lounge Access Option (LAo) and the Extra Baggage Option (XBo).\n\nOur unique technologies are based upon concurrent optimization for travelers and travel providers. Our optimization approach concentrates on the overall value for the parties involved rather than simply on a specific product or service. Optiontown is owned and operated by Tenon & Groove, LLC, which was founded in 2003. Our vision is to develop unique travel options that can help optimize value for both travelers and travel providers. Over the last few years, we have developed several ground-breaking patented optimization technologies in the field of travel. Our people come from a wide range of backgrounds with a common goal of excellence. Tenon & Groove, LLC is headquartered in Massachusetts, USA and has wholly-owned subsidiaries in Canada and India. 1) Flight Pass Option\n\n2) Upgrade Travel Option \n\n3) Empty Seat Option \n\n4) Preferred Seat Option \n\n5) Extra Baggage Option \n\n6) Lounge Access Option \n\n7) Priority Handling Option \n\n8) Flexibility Reward Option \n\n9) Multiple Booking Option ifsIndexForPickASeat
